resources.string: We are a small team of developers from the Pacific Northwest. We strive to make applications cleaner and more intuitive for the user through simple, yet beautiful, interfaces. This app combines simple or advanced calculations with a large variety of unit conversions. It is intended for home and office use, and is available in both English and Spanish versions.
